title: Designer Mindset: Change your Mind, Change your Life
description: AS SEEN NBC NEWS, CEO WORLD MAGAZINE, FOX, MIAMI HERALD, ABC, and much more!Embrace change, re-design your mindset & create a life you truly desire!What motivates us?Why do we allow fear to hold us back?How do we empower ourselves to change?In this inspiring self-awareness guide, Gina shares the secrets behind the concept of re-designing your mindset. She explains how she went from homeless, in debt, addicted to drugs, and suffering PTSD and depression, to founding her own company and working alongside the world's top motivation speakers.In this book, you'll learn how Stop self-sabotaging behaviors, negative thinking & addictive attitudesTap into unlimited confidenceMaster your emotions & mindsetAttract abundance & fulfilling relationshipsEmbrace change & create a life you truly desire!If you are ready for change then this is the book for you!
author: Gina Carr√©
